Premier League champions Chelsea have reportedly made a huge £62m bid for Italy international Andrea Belotti. It is thought that Serie A side Torino have rejected this offer in an attempt to keep the talented forward at the club.

Belotti is one of the biggest talents in Serie A, with the striker netting 26 goals in 35 league appearances for a Torino side that finished 9th last season.

According to a report by Tuttosport, Torino rejected the bid in order to force the Premier League giants to activate Belotti's £88m release clause.

【now.com體育】伊巴謙莫域重返曼聯已有眉目，贊助商「三間」率先跳出來「官宣」！
瑞典老將伊巴謙莫域（Zlatan Ibrahimovic）因嚴重受傷，目前沒有合約在身，但仍跟隨曼聯訓練；根據「三間」的最新消息，雙方再度合作已甚囂塵上。 「三間」在美國的官網上，已開售曼聯新球季的伊巴球衣，並可以印上10號，基本上等於提早宣佈交易落實，兼透露其新季的球衣號碼。上季穿9號的伊巴，其號碼現已交給新加盟的盧卡古，但目前10號在朗尼離隊後仍然懸空。 35歲的伊巴骨格精奇，預期膝傷比普通球員早一個月康復，但最快也要到12月才能復出，相信會簽下半年短約。作為上季「紅魔」首席射手，這名瑞典鬼才上陣28場英超，射入17球，傷癒後若可成為盧卡古的替補，曼聯實是如虎添翼。

Tuchel also has a good record with using young players - a quality which the Blues admire.

Chelsea have had an up and down start to the season, losing their Premier League opener against Burnley before beating Tottenham at Wembley last Sunday.

Conte is known to be unhappy with Chelsea's dealings in the transfer market and wants more signings before the transfer window shuts on August 31.

The Blues have added Antonio Rudiger, Willy Caballero, Tiemoue Bakayoko and Alvaro Morata to their squad.

But with the sale of Nemanja Matic to Manchester United and Diego Costa being told he can leave Stamford Bridge, Conte wants to bring in further recruits.

Chelsea return to action against Everton in the Premier League on Sunday.
